first.title: Secure online photo sales
first.description: Our application enables photographers to securely manage and sell photos online, providing advanced watermarks that protect your work from unauthorized use.

second.title: Intelligent photo filtering
second.description: With our AI solutions, including face detection, you can easily filter your photo galleries, making it easier for clients to find exactly what they are looking for.

third.title: Private and public galleries
third.description: Create private and public photo galleries that allow your clients to conveniently browse, select, and purchase their favorite photos. Our intuitive tools facilitate management of your photo collections.

fourth.title: Popular online payment options
fourth.description: We offer integrated online payment options that allow your clients to make quick and secure photo purchases. This simplifies and streamlines the sales process.

fifth.title: Calendar management and session booking system
fifth.description: Integrate your photography projects with our intelligent session booking and calendar management system. It enables easy session booking for clients and efficient time management for you.
